abstract: AMC Theaters and Regal Entertainment are both introducing services that will allow movie-goers to preorder and prepay for concessions using their smartphones in order to reduce amount of time customers stand in line.
lead_paragraph: The largest multiplex chains in North America, AMC Theaters and Regal Entertainment, are introducing technology that allows customers to order and pay for food and drinks from their smartphones, then pick them up.

headline.main: Movie Theater Apps to Bypass the Popcorn Lines
headline.print_headline: Cinema Apps Bypass the Popcorn Lines

snippet: The largest multiplex chains in North America, AMC Theaters and Regal Entertainment, are introducing technology that allows customers to order and pay for food and drinks from their smartphones, then pick them up.
